title: someone gifted me a couple of skin, and there weren't there at all?
body:
I woke up and got on league, and it said I had notifications, randomly I got three skins and a ward from this random person that wasn't my friend on league, it was some pretty gnarly ones too. I went to play one of the champions but during the "choose your layout" ones, it said that it was locked/unavailable for purchase. I haven't gave anyone my password, or even my login username. Did I get anything at all? Or am I gonna be bamboozled forever? 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: After looking over your account and the one that sent you those gifts, it looks like someone tried to send some gifts and then have their bank reverse the purchases. Since the purchase was refunded, the gifts were too.
